Grand MasterAnswered on 10 Jun 2019I believe most credit card companies have wised up and no longer give credit card points for insurance premiums (not just life insurer, but general insurers too)I used to pay via Standard Chartered Bank's Manhanttan credit card to enjoy the cashback, and now, all the life insurance, car insurance etc no longer enjoys cashback.I believe its the same for all cashback cards, and probably most, if not all cards from Visa / Mastercard.I will be happy to know if there are still cards that give points for insurance premiums.0 comments3
